LanguageData.Feenix.label: Feenix
LanguageData.Feenix.description: Said to be fire incarnate, a single Feenix can lay waste to an entire colony. The leave a trail of flames wherever they go. Their hearts will continue to pulse with heat even after the creature has died.
LanguageData.Feenix.tools.0.label: Left claw
LanguageData.Feenix.tools.1.label: Right claw
LanguageData.Feenix.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Feenix_Leather.label: Feenix leather
LanguageData.Feenix_Corpse.label: Feenix corpse
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.label: green wyvern
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.description: A large, volatile draconic predator. Unlike true dragons, wyverns are capable of flight using their modified arms rather than distinct wing appendages.
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.tools.0.label: Left claw
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.tools.1.label: Right claw
LanguageData.GreenWyvern.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.GreenWyvern_Leather.label: green wyvern leather
LanguageData.GreenWyvern_Corpse.label: green wyvern corpse
LanguageData.Kirin.label: kirin
LanguageData.Kirin.description: Born of frost, Misterious Kirin leave a trail of frost wherever they go. They are solitary creatures. Their fur and heart are highly prized on the rim worlds for their high insulation, and supposed medicinal usage.
LanguageData.Kirin.tools.0.label: Left paw
LanguageData.Kirin.tools.1.label: Right paw
LanguageData.Kirin.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Kirin_Leather.label: kirin leather
LanguageData.Kirin_Corpse.label: kirin corpse
LanguageData.Behir.label: Behir
LanguageData.Behir.description: A behir is a huge blue serpentine magical beast with a crocodilian head; the creature is around forty feet long and weighs around four thousand pounds. They can run quickly on their twelve short, powerful legs, or slither by folding their legs close to their body.
LanguageData.Behir.tools.0.label: left leg claw
LanguageData.Behir.tools.1.label: right leg claw
LanguageData.Behir.tools.2.label: left claw
LanguageData.Behir.tools.3.label: right claw
LanguageData.Behir.tools.5.label: head
LanguageData.Behir_Leather.label: Behir leather
LanguageData.Behir_Corpse.label: Behir corpse
LanguageData.FRaptor.label: feathered raptor
LanguageData.FRaptor.description: Quiet, cunning, elegant and ruthless, these protobird species were originally developed to resolve an increasing warg population problem. Someone quickly realized that adding another alpha predator doesn't help an already broken ecosystem, and the project was cancelled. Scientists then started a new development project that was aimed at making raptors the pets of rich people. Because of that, these raptors now have colorful feathers.
LanguageData.FRaptor.tools.0.label: left leg claw
LanguageData.FRaptor.tools.1.label: right leg claw
LanguageData.FRaptor.tools.2.label: left claw
LanguageData.FRaptor.tools.3.label: right claw
LanguageData.FRaptor.tools.5.label: head
LanguageData.FRaptor_Leather.label: feathered raptor leather
LanguageData.FRaptor_Corpse.label: feathered raptor corpse
LanguageData.Barghest.label: barghest
LanguageData.Barghest.description: A ghostly hound of lore, the sight of it is rumoured to foretell one's death.
LanguageData.Barghest.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Barghest.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Barghest.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Barghest_Leather.label: barghest leather
LanguageData.Barghest_Corpse.label: barghest corpse
